Gotron

Gotron exits the ship on Zardus' orders, and fires on Deemos.
______________________________________________________________________
Zava

Phobia's ship was about to take off, and the entrance was closing. 
She turned on her jet pack at full burst and made it into Phobia's 
ship just before it closed. She went and hid in a dark corner.

"Yes....soon all these Predacons will die."
______________________________________________________________________
Starscream

Starscream, on the ship, checks to make sure everyone is here.

"Phobia...Pseduo...Atma...Goldeneye....Dollen...Terrorsaur...Hey, has 
anyone seen KitKat?"
______________________________________________________________________
Vulois

Vulois begins to run faster, as his hope fufills.

"I'm sure you've al heard of Transmetal tchnology, and how Megatron 
mde it stronger into Transmetal 2. Well, when I was evil, I stumbled 
across a TM3 driver, even stronger than TM2. Soundwave built the 
machine to use it. I'm a TM3 right now. That's why I have so many 
tactics. Battera is a TM3, and so was Soundwave. We were the only 
ones ever to use the technology. I was caught trying to double-cross 
Hell Beast, and he took it from me. So now I.....LOOK! We're here!!!"

Vulois drops the equipment and looks around. A tear came to his eye. 
This was the first place he ever met Soundwave, after calling him to 
him. He sat down and cried, tears of joy and tears of Sadness.
______________________________________________________________________
Savage

The quills get stuck in Savage's hide, and Striker's shots make huge 
gashes in Savage's skin. He yells out a roar of agony, big enough to 
be heard miles away. He looked at Striker and smelled. This bot had 
alot of him on him. This was the one he almost killed before. He sent 
two fireballs at each of them.
______________________________________________________________________
Brix/Fliq

"Well...kinda," saiid Brix, "But never a planet as beautiful as this."

They continued towards the ship.
